name: Animated Gradient Tutorial (Smart Animate)
description:
Stripe Inspired Gradient Animation Using Prototyping

The challenge today? Recreate a gradient animation similar to Stripes, in Figma. SPOILER ALERT: We did it.

A full guided tutorial on my YouTube Channel.


If you want to learn more Figma tips and tricks and other design processes, go head over to my YouTube Channel and make sure to subscribe and leave a comment!
